title: Stolen Paradise
description: These monsters rule the city... and I've become their newest obsession.I've been caught in a war between the three most powerful gangs in the city... and I'm trapped with the most dangerous of them all.The Kings.With each passing day, they lurk closer, their darkness pulling me a bit deeper. They push me, demanding everything I have when my world is falling apart.Chaos is about to break out, and I'm finding myself craving the men who could just as easily break me. Ruin me. Kill me.I vow to escape, but I’m losing myself to this world of lust and war.The Kings of Eden don’t have hearts. So they want mine...18+ Romance. Kings of Eden is a full length, dark paranormal romance with enemies to lovers themes, featuring three psychotic, tormented alphaholes and a sassy heroine. Contains some dark themes and panty-melting steam and is a story where the heroine will end up with more than one love interest.Kings of Eden SeriesKings of EdenStolen ParadiseRuthless Lies
author: Mila Young
